tool_description: Validates and cleans raw music usage data from various sources, checking for data integrity, format compliance, and identifying potential errors or inconsistencies.

raw_usage_data.description: Array of raw usage data strings from various sources

data_source_type.description: Type of data source: streaming, broadcast, sync, live_performance

required_fields.description: Fields that must be present in each record

error_messages: Data limit exceeded: Maximum 50000 usage records per validation batch. Process in smaller batches.
Invalid source type: Use streaming, broadcast, sync, or live_performance for data_source_type.
Malformed data: Raw usage data contains unparseable records. Check data format and structure.
Invalid validation level: Use strict, moderate, or lenient for validation_strictness.
usage: Provide raw_usage_data array and specify data_source_type. Optionally set validation_strictness and required_fields based on your data quality needs.

valid_records.description: Array of validated and cleaned usage records

invalid_count.description: Number of records that failed validation

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and issues found
